comments.content: We’re back. Mega traffic + malfunctioning log rotation = sad site.

That’s what you get for april fooling us... Er, no, wait, that deprives us of our addiction.

Thanks!
oh! i thought the slowness was due to melted hds or baby boomering memory sticks.
